definition:
A long standing conjecture:

<strong>Conjecture</strong> Every regular paratopological
group is Tychonoff.

I propose to formulate and prove a more general statement about
funcoids.

It may may involve product of funcoids, such as cross-composition
product or not yet well described direct product of continuous funcoids.
phrase: Conjecture: Every Regular Paratopological Group Is Tychonoff
